GClasses::GRowDistance

GClasses::GRowDistance Class Reference

This uses Euclidean distance for continuous attributes, and Hamming distance for nominal attributes. More...

Detailed Description

This uses Euclidean distance for continuous attributes, and Hamming distance for nominal attributes.
